snippet: The Tallis Scholars, the superb English a cappella ensemble, offered works for double choir by Renaissance and contemporary composers on Saturday at the Church of St. Mary the Virgin.
abstract: Vivien Schweitzer reviews performance by English a cappella ensemble Tallis Scholars at Church of St Mary the Virgin.
lead_paragraph: The Tallis Scholars, the superb English a cappella ensemble, offered works for double choir by Renaissance and contemporary composers on Saturday at the Church of St. Mary the Virgin.

headline.seo: The Tallis Scholars at the Church of St. Mary the Virgin
headline.main: A Little Peace, Just Off Times Square
headline.print_headline: A Little Peace, Just Off Times Square
